## Conditions.ConditionCollector class

A `ValidatingCollector` for [Conditions](./ts-res.conditions.condition.md)<!-- -->, which collects conditions supplied as either [Condition](./ts-res.conditions.condition.md) or [IConditionDecl](./ts-res.conditions.iconditiondecl.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ConditionCollector extends ValidatingCollector<Condition> 
```
**Extends:** ValidatingCollector&lt;[Condition](./ts-res.condition.md)<!-- -->&gt;
